Question
========

Of 7 subjects, before and after a given effort of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 7 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 15 and the standard deviation is 28. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.42
* 1.44
* 2.84
* 3.87

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.42: Correct
* 1.44: Incorrect
* 2.84: Incorrect
* 3.87: Incorrect
